reviewText:
Forget Pilates, Yoga and all the other Methods ;) !! Lotte Berk is the fastest way to reshape and gives you the body you always wanted!
It's more than five star quality!!!
I was disappointed in this workout. Not a challenge at all. It is defintely for beginners.

I have so many exercise videos, and to be honest I am not sure this is one of the best.  I was expecting a better workout, and I did not think the instructions were very clear.  I'll keep trying, though

I had heard about the Lotte Berk method in various magazine, I finally bought this product because I needed to step away from the standard yoga and pilate practices. This really burns the abs and the routines spice things up a bit. Well balanced in exercise with a bit of dance.
